name: HackerRank Clone
description: Built a HackerRank-like online code judge using Java, Spring Boot, and Next.js. Executed user-submitted code in isolated Docker containers, enforcing memory and time limits while evaluating test cases.

name: UF MarketPlace
description: Built a secure marketplace for university students, implementing login and email verification features, enabling users to post and purchase items.

name: Kubernetes Adaptive Resource Controller
description: Developed an adaptive feedback-based controller for Kubernetes to optimize resource utilization amid 30% workload variability. Implemented PID-based local and global controllers, maintaining stable CPU usage across 50+ nodes and pods.

name: News Article Analysis Using SRL
description: Developed an NLP system for news article analysis using Python, SpaCy, Hugging Face, and TensorFlow. Fine-tuned a BERT model to identify actors and actions with 87% accuracy and created a rating system to rank actors based on their influence within articles.

name: P2P File Sharing Program
description: Developed a peer-to-peer (P2P) file-sharing program using Python. Implemented a choking-unchoking mechanism and a secure handshake for efficient piece exchange and resource management.

name: Homecoming
description: Secured 5th place out of 5,790 teams in IIT Bombay's 'e-Yantra' robotics competition. Built a line-following robot using OpenCV, PyTorch, and Firebird V, integrating a CNN model with 75% accuracy to identify animals and habitats.
